short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows to crawl websites, collect publicly available emails, and upload them to Grabaro platform.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Grabaro Google Chrome Extension is a tool that allows Grabaro users to collect publicly available emails in a GDPR-compliant manner. This extension can be especially useful for sales and marketing professionals who are looking to expand their lead generation efforts.
